name: Learn Pearly Words
tagline: Learn new vocabulary using a simple program
body:
### Welcome to Learn Words in Perl
Learn-words was built to make it easier to learn words. It has various ways to learn, including multiple choice questions. It doesn't count how many times you are correct, but it does tell you when you are incorrect.

Download source code at [https://github.com/bean5/learn_words/zipball/master](https://github.com/bean5/learn_words/zipball/master).

### Requirements
Installation of [Perl](http://www.perl.org/get.html)

### Programming Language
* This was written in Perl.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Got some some ideas for the project? Just leave feedback at [https://github.com/bean5/learn_words/issues/new](https://github.com/bean5/learn_words/issues/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
